titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Knights of Columbus of Long Island records 1978.179
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:12:44 +0000.

did.unittitle: Knights of Columbus of Long Island records
did.abstract: The collection includes constitution, reports, printed communications, newsletters, programs from the Knights of Columbus of Long Island, dated 1901 to 1966. Some Brooklyn material is included.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The records were formally accessioned in 1978.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Knights of Columbus of Long Island records, 1978.179, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
